mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO REG_CODE_NAME(REG_CD,REG_NAME)
SELECT #{item.REG_CD}, #{item.REG_NAME} FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO ACC_MAIN_NAME(ACC_TYPE,ACC_TYPE_NM)
SELECT #{item.acc_type}, #{item.acc_type_nm} FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO ACC_SUB_NAME(ACC_DTYPE,ACC_DTYPE_NM)
SELECT #{item.acc_dtype}, #{item.acc_dtype_nm} FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT CCTVID , CCTVNAME , CENTERNAME , XCOORD , YCOORD FROM DATA_CCTV WHERE (XCOORD BETWEEN #{minX} AND #{maxX}) AND (YCOORD BETWEEN #{minY} AND #{maxY})
SELECT CCTVID , CCTVNAME , CENTERNAME , XCOORD , YCOORD FROM DATA_CCTV WHERE CENTERNAME LIKE '%서울%' OR CCTVNAME LIKE '%서울%' ORDER BY CCTVID DESC

SELECT CCTVID , CCTVNAME , CENTERNAME , XCOORD , YCOORD FROM DATA_CCTV WHERE (XCOORD BETWEEN #{minX} AND #{maxX}) AND (YCOORD BETWEEN #{minY} AND #{maxY}) AND CENTERNAME LIKE '%서울%' OR CCTVNAME LIKE '%서울%' ORDER BY CCTVID DESC
